text: Savignano sul Rubicone is a comune in the Province of Forlì-Cesena in the Emilia-Romagna region in Italy. == Twin towns == Savignano sul Rubicone is twinned with: * Nizza Monferrato, Italy * Vals-les-Bains, France == References == Category:Settlements in Forlì-Cesena
title: Savignano sul Rubicone
